subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After three disappointing innings against the Pittsburgh Pirates, Pedro Martínez lowered his head to weep in the dugout and the Mets will have to wait another day for a chance to clinch the division.
snippet: After three disappointing innings against the Pittsburgh Pirates, Pedro Martínez lowered his head to weep in the dugout and the Mets will have to wait another day for a chance to clinch the division.
